comments.en:
Use the Kyocera PPD file for PostScript (Instructions)
1200dpi in PostScript mode
600dpi with PCL5e monochrome drivers ljet4 and ljet4d for PCL5e and duplex
300dpi with PCL 5c color driver cljet5 (note the driver information).

48 MB RAM, upgradeable to 112 MB
Emulations:
PostScript II (KPDL2) with Automatic Emulation Sensing
HP Color LaserJet 5 (PCL5c, PJL), Prescribe II
All common Barcode-Fonts (including 2D Barcodes) in ROM
Reprogrammable EEPROM
A network-interface like SB-110 (100Mb/s, supported protocols: TCP/IP, AppleTalk, Novell) is highly recommended, the parallel-port is too slow for such amounts of data (printing a full-color 1200x1200dpi DIN A4 page transfers up to 52 MB of data).

Maximum paper width: 8.5 inches / 21.6 cm (Standard format printer)

Printing engine speed: 4 pages/min
